title: Shebuel
html: SHEBUEL(Shebʹu·el) [He Returned to God; Captive of God].The two men named Shebuel are both alternately referred to as Shubael.1. A Levitical son or descendant of Moses’ son Gershom. (1Ch 23:15, 16) Shebuel’s (Shubael’s) paternal house was enrolled when David reorganized the Levitical services (1Ch 24:20, 30b, 31), being given duties that included caring for the stores.—1Ch 26:24.2. One of the sons of Heman and an expert musician selected by lot to head the 13th division of sanctuary musicians.—1Ch 25:4, 6, 9, 20.
